Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 5 lines of text on the recto containing a fragmentary letter.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (341-342, pl. 52)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82919) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82919)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II Ad 6 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
